data.title: Fox Film Twentieth Century Pictures: Nineteen Eighty-Four
data.meta_description: 19 Entertainment - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document provides the origins and meanings behind the names of various companies. It explains that 19 Entertainment was named after a Paul Hardcastle single and that Simon Fuller later founded XIX Entertainment which is 19 in Roman numerals. It also discusses how 7-Eleven got its name from extending its hours to 7am-11pm and how Amazon was named after the large Amazon river to represent the company's goal of handling large volumes of online book sales.
